duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care, including medication administration, wound care, and symptom management.
Collaborate with the healthcare team to develop and implement care plans for patients.
Assess patient conditions, monitor vital signs, and coordinate with physicians for treatment plans.
Educate patients and their families about disease management and preventive care measures.
Maintain accurate patient records and documentation in compliance with healthcare regulations.
Adhere to infection control procedures and maintain a safe and clean healthcare environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing (Master's degree preferred)
